.billQuote {
	font-family: "Comic Sans MS", cursive;
	opacity: 0;
	z-index: 999999;
	position: fixed;
	bottom: 10px;
	left: 10px;
	font-size: 18px;
	color: purple;
	animation: showUp 10s forwards;
	animation-delay: 5s;
}

@keyframes showUp {
	0% { opacity: 0; }
	100% { opacity: 1; }
}

@keyframes pulse {
  0% {bottom: 545px; transform: scale(1); opacity: 0.1; }
  50% {bottom: 545px; transform: scale(1.1); opacity: 0.7; }
  100% {bottom: 545px; transform: scale(1); opacity: 0.1; }
}

</style>
